transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, abhi aawaz aa rahi hai sir clear ab aapko.
Executive: Haan, theek aa rahi hai par ab theek aa rahi hai pehle se bhi.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. So, mai na actually aap se discussion karna chah rahi thi. Kal hi aapka discussion hua tha Kunal ke saath aapke catalog se related. To mai jaanna chah rahi thi sir abhi aapne na actually kya kiya hai not satisfied mark kiya hai Kunal ko. To aap mujhe bataiye kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir aapko Kunal ke saath kaam karne me koi issue aa raha hai ya phir services me koi problem hai aap mujhe bataiye ek baari.
Customer: O issue, saab Kunal wo chakkar kya hai ji usme setting me jaate hai na IndiaMART khojte hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To usme no relevant by lead aata hai turant.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To yahi dikkat thi ji. Aur koi business nahi nikal raha hai. Kunal ko agar mera account manager badal do to bahut hi achha ho.
Executive: Achha to matlab aap chahte ho ki jo aapka account manager hai wo aapka change ho jaaye right? Kyuki unke saath kaam karne me aapko issues aa rahe hai.
Customer: Dikkat to yahi hai ji business nahi nikal raha hai kuch bhi.
Executive: Theek hai pehle to mai dekho account manager to mai aapka change kara deti hu sir koi dikkat nahi hai. But dusri cheeze mai aapko ye samjhana chahungi abhi na dekhiye aapko itna zyada time nahi hua hai sir services live karaye hue. Almost abhi aapka do mahine aapka hua hai right? September me aapne karaya tha aapne services live. To bahut zyada time nahi hua hai. To actually kya hota hai na aap jab bhi naya naya services apna IndiaMART par aap register karate hai. Theek hai? To waha pe kya hota hai sir waha pe ek se do mahine to sir aapko uske according visibility banane me lag jaate hai. Bolo. Theek hai? Baaki mai ye check kar rahi hu.
Executive: Haan baaki mai ye check kar rahi hu ki pehle bhi aapne ek saal services use kari hai IndiaMART par. To almost aapne do saal use kiya IndiaMART ka services right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. To almost matlab aapko pata hi hoga IndiaMART ki services ko kaise use karna hai, kaise aapko is tarah ka option use kar sakte hai ye sab cheeze to aapko already pata hoga sir right? Mujhe batane ki zarurat nahi hogi waha pe. Theek hai. To abhi basically aapka jo main issue hai wo wahi hai ki Kunal ke saath aap baat nahi kar pa rahe hai. To mai ye cheez karwa deti hu ki mai na aapka account manager change karwa deti hu.
Customer: Theek hai. Ji, ji.
Executive: Mai karwa deti hu. Haan, mai karwa deti hu aur dusri cheez ki mai na ye ek kaam karti hu by leads jo aapki product se related aa rahi hai. Abhi filhaal kya ho raha hai ki aapko apne product se related by lead nahi show ho rahi hai. Waise sir hum jo deal karte hai wo hum pan India deal kar rahe hai ya phir sirf hum local Alwar Rajasthan me dekhte hai?
Customer: Nahi all India me kar raha hu mam.
Executive: All over India kar rahe hai. Theek hai aur minimum order quantity kya rehta hai sir hamara?
Customer: Minimum order to dekho ji 50,000 bhi ho jaata hai 25 bhi ho jaata hai.
Executive: Achha. Theek hai. Jaise mai abhi na aapka ye black marble sivling karke aapka ek product hai. Mai usme check kar rahi thi ki black marble sivling me kya requirements aayi hui hai. To ek na sivling karke ek requirement aaya hua tha sir Mumbai ka jisme 11 pieces ki requirement thi.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. To ye by lead aap lenge kya?
Customer: Bilkul le lenge ji sivling ka hai.
Executive: Achha. Theek hai Mumbai ka hai. Mai ek kaam karti hu.
Customer: Sivling ka hai na?
Executive: Sorry? Haan haan sivling ka hai sir sivling ka hai.
Customer: Stone nahi hai na stone marble me?
Executive: Uh ye dekhiye sirf mere ko yaha pe na sivling karke requirement aaya hua hai sir yaha pe na wo nahi likha hua hai. Color me black likha hua hai. Aur baaki haan baaki sivling ki requirement likhi hai. Aapka same number WhatsApp pe hai kya?
Customer: Haan ji bilkul sahi hai.
Executive: Bataiyega ek baari apna WhatsApp number sir.
Customer: 82
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: 82
Executive: 82
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 33
Customer: 33
Customer: 9
Executive: 9
Customer: 15
Executive: 15
Customer: 11
Executive: 11. Okay. Yaha pe dekhiye maine na aapko link bhej diya hai WhatsApp pe ye aap check kar lijiyega jaise hi hamara call disconnect hoga na aap check kar lijiyega. Aur baaki mai na yahi karti hu ki mai na filhaal kya karti hu aapka na jisse bhi mai account manager aapka change karwaungi. Mai kuch time unko bolungi ki aapko kuch by leads na wo WhatsApp par share kare.
Executive: Theek hai? Ek baari aapka pattern ban jaayega na to phir aapko us related by lead aani shuru ho jaayegi. Dusri cheeze mai aapko ye bolungi ki ek baar aap on video meet connect hoke na aap ek baar apna catalog bhi thoda improve karwaiye sir. Aapka jo catalog ka content improve hai.
Customer: Catalog mera sudhariye aap. Mai yahi bol raha tha catalog sudhariye aap mera.
Executive: Ji. Mai unse ab wo to ye keh rahe hai past me to lead aa rahi hai past me to lead aa rahi hai lekin mere mobile me to screen pe darsha hi nahi rahi wo.
Executive: Haan bilkul to mai samajh rahi hu wo aa rahi hai lekin wahi hai na ki aapke product se related waha pe dikh nahi rahi hai product me wo maine check kiya abhi. To wo kya hua hai aapka jo pattern bana hua tha na aapki category se related wo remove ho chuka hai. To uske liye hame kya karna hoga uske liye hame pehle na hamare product se related by leads consume karni hogi chahe wo kaisi bhi aa rahi hai. Bhale hi wo ek piece ki aa rahi hai lekin aap usko consume karo. Ab jaise na ye aapka marble god statue hai. Usme maine na search kiya hai theek hai? Ab yaha pe brass brass laddu gopal ke karke requirement aaya hua hai to isme hum deal karte hai kya brass wale me kisi.
Customer: Nahi brass me nahi karte marble.
Executive: Marble nahi karte na? Haan. To marble ki nahi aayi hui hai ye brass ki dikh rahi hai hame.
Executive: To possibly na hame yahi karna padega ki ek baari na aap aap thoda on video meet connect hoiye. Saath me baith ke aap ek baar apna catalog theek karwaiye. Theek hai? Aap waha par aap aap waha par available rahenge aap waha par baith ke aap apna sahi karayenge to wo zyada better rahega kyuki waha pe kya hoga phir waha pe uske according aap dekh paayenge ki jo hum yaha se cheeze improve kar rahe hai wo hum sahi kar rahe hai ki nahi kar rahe hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan baaki na mai aapko kuch by leads aur bhej dungi jaise na ye metal ganesh statue karke ek requirement hai isme deal karte hai kya?
Customer: Nahi metal me nahi hai hum to only stone marble ka karte hai aur mai abhi thoda na thoda Jaipur hu mai Jaipur se apne gaav pahunch raha hu apne gaav. To thoda mai safar me hu hai na? Mai aur shaam ko phone karunga aapko.
Executive: Ek kaam kijiyega sir maine na aapko already WhatsApp par hi bheja hua hai theek hai? By lead bhi bheji hui hai. Aap mera number save kijiye aap mere ko directly mere number pe coordinate kijiyega theek hai? Kyuki aap customer care se call karte hai aapke customer care bhi hum hi hai. To it's better hai ki aap mere ko mere number pe directly coordinate karo. Jo bhi issues honge hum waha pe ek baari discuss kar lenge. Theek hai? Aur abhi ye call disconnect haan abhi mai matlab yaha se disconnect karungi aapka concern close karungi na to aapke paas ek mere feedback ke liye na WhatsApp pe aur mail par dono jagah aapke paas jaise notification aayega jaise aapne Kunal ke liye aapne kiya tha na. Hmm. As it is mere liye waha par feedback aayega to aap se request hai bas waha pe aap positive feedback de dijiyega bas.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai mam mai abhi thoda safar me hu hai na? Abhi karta hu mai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap free hoke mujhe call kariye sir.
Customer: Theek hai ji zaroor.
Executive: Okay. Shaam tak phone jaunga. Theek hai madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants account manager changed from Kunal.

- No relevant buyleads, no business.

- Catalog not showing products correctly.



Resolution:

- Agreed to change account manager.

- Will share buyleads on WhatsApp temporarily.

- Suggested on-video meet to improve catalog.

- Sent link on WhatsApp for sivling requirement.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call back when free.

- Customer to provide positive feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, buyleads, catalog, whatsapp
